title: Order & ChaosÂ© Online Version 1.1.1 ipad.ipod.iphone
description:
Description
Finally a true real-time, full-3D MMORPG comes to the App Store: Explore a vast heroic fantasy world and join thousands of players in this massively multiplayer online experience that pushes the boundaries of epic!

** FREE 3-MONTH SUBSCRIPTION GRANTED at your first log in! Then you can renew your allegiance for only $0.99/month, $1.99 for 3 months or $2.99 for 6 months! **
** IMPORTANT: Please make sure your device is compatible with this app. Compatible devices include: iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPod touch 3G & 4G and iPad 1 & 2.
A Wi-Fi connection and a Gameloft LIVE! account are required to play the game. **


WHO YOU WILL BE? Use the advanced character creation system to customize your hero:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 4 races available: Elves and Humans fight for Order, Orcs and Undead for Chaos. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Choose your gender, appearance, class and talent. With over 1000 skills and 2000 pieces of equipment to discover, your adventure will not be over soon.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create up to 4 different characters to play.

INTERACT WITH THE COMMUNITY
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Make friends or enemies, trade, challenge, communicate and more: a wide range of interactions makes each player a living part of this universe.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Join a party or guild to become stronger and coordinate with your teammates, or you can choose to adventure solo, interacting with other players peacefully or otherwiseÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

THE WORLD IS YOURS
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Travel through the most majestic settings - from dark forests to deserts, jungles, mountains and more - on foot or by magical means. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Talk and interact with hundreds of characters to find over 500 quests to perform.

Enter the legend now!

*********
Follow Gameloft on Twitter to get more info about all our upcoming titles atlike us on Facebook ator visit us on www.gameloft.com!
... Show More
What's new in Version 1.1.1
It's time to celebrate the 1-year Anniversary of Order & Chaos Online. The Realm is about to have fun, so join the celebrations in this update.

Thanks for your support during this past year; we had an amazing time together full of new discoveries and deadly dungeons. And now, weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve prepared a fun update just for you. 
Enjoy!

3G support. The game now fully supports both 3G and Wi-Fi. Play your favorite MMORPG anywhere!

All talent points have been reset for game re-balancing. Check your mailbox for your skill books. 

New content includes:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 3G support.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New quests.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Free gift box for all players.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Thank-you letter.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Anniversary pet -> for +3-month players.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fireworks -> visible in town + possible to buy.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Special clothes on NPCs (Non-Player Characters).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New items.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New pets.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 1 quiz mini-game in the capital.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New lottery system integrated. This may be your lucky day.

Bug fixes and adjustments:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Graphics improvements (iPhone 4S, iPad 2 & new iPad);
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Server code optimizations;
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Various bug fixes.
